com.microsoft.azure.keyvault.cryptography

Class KeyWrapAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.keyvault.cryptography.Algorithm
      • com.microsoft.azure.keyvault.cryptography.KeyWrapAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AesKw

    public abstract class KeyWrapAlgorithm
extends Algorithm
    Abstract base class for all key wrap algorithms.

        public abstract ICryptoTransform CreateEncryptor(byte[] key)
                                          throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                                 NoSuchPaddingException,
                                                 InvalidKeyException,
                                                 InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
        Creates a ICryptoTransform implementation for encryption. Uses the default AES-KW initialization vector.
        Parameters:
        key - The AES key material to be used.
        Returns:
        A ICryptoTransform implementation
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException
        NoSuchPaddingException
        InvalidKeyException
        InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
